column12: Approve pilot program allowing alcohol in some parks
column13: Pursue a ban of two-stroke small engine equipment, such as leaf blowers
column14: Approve new land transfer tax rates on high-value residential properties
column15: Authorize the Toronto Parking Authority to raise on-street rates beyond $5 per hour
column16: Report on developing commercial parking levy
column17: Report on establishing City of Toronto sales tax
column18: Report on higher land transfer tax rates for buyers seeking to own multiple homes in Toronto
column19: Triple the vacant home tax rate, from 1% to 3%
column20: Put a cap on the number of licenses available to drivers for Uber, Lyft, etc.
column21: Move forward with requirement that all ride-hail vehicles be zero-emission by 2031
column22: Adopt "public builder" model for five sites as part of new housing strategy
column23: Expand the Toronto Community Crisis Service as a city-wide emergency service
column24: Advance design on Waterfront East LRT
column25: Request federal government take urgent action on refugee crisis, including consideration of using armouries as shelters
column26: Adopt new traffic calming policies; do not refer back to staff for consideration of ward-specific policies
column27: Approve principles of the new deal with the provincial government, including Gardiner/DVP upload
column28: Rename Yonge-Dundas Square as Sankofa Square
column29: Request TTC rename Dundas and Dundas West subway stations
column30: Enter agreement to accept federal Housing Accelerator Funds, increase permissions for density
column31: Require medium and large buildings to report energy and water use data
column32: Rename Centennial Park stadium after Rob Ford
column33: Defer consideration of RapidTO program until after costs of Scarborough busway are final
column34: Approve implementation of foreign buyer tax
column35: Develop a framework for managing and monitoring protests
column36: Remove signs prohibiting tobogganing at parks
column37: Approve lease extensions for shelter hotels
column38: Add another $12.6 million to proposed 2024 police budget increase
column39: Approve property tax increases for 2024, including 9.5% total increase for residential
column40: Report on community benefits plan for hosting FIFA World Cup 2026
column41: Review all city-owned parking lots and other property for housing and other city building opportunities
column42: Make alcohol-in-parks pilot project permanent in select parks
column45: Permit six-storey apartments and townhouses on major streets
column46: If Bill 185 is enacted, request province restrict third-party appeals for affordable housing projects
column47: Do not ask province to pass legislation allowing "bubble zones" around religious institutions, restricting protests
column48: Authorize construction of "Complete Street" on Eglinton, including bike lanes
column50: Move forward with design of renovictions bylaw
column51: Approve new encampment strategy, focused on outreach and support
column52: Move forward with plan to rename Dundas Square as "Sankofa Square"
column53: Don't delay approval of Villiers Island plan to conduct more aiport impact analysis
column54: Keep Etobicoke bikeways in 2025-2027 cycling network plan
column55: Keep bike lanes as installed on Bloor West
column56: Approve acceleration plan for Gardiner Expressway construction work
column57: Procure two electric ferries to serve Toronto Islands, at cost of $92 million
column58: Consult on stormwater charge for non-residential as opportunity to reduce flooding
